topic: How to deploy web backends using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to deploy web backends using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deploying Web Backends Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a step-by-step process on how to deploy web backends using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
key_points: Setting up a new FastAPI project
Writing your API endpoints in Python 3.12+
Testing your API locally using FastAPI's built-in tools
Deploying your FastAPI application to popular platforms
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for this guide.
Uvicorn (the recommended ASGI server) works best with Python 3.8 or higher.
caveats: Ensure you have the necessary dependencies installed (FastAPI, Uvicorn, etc.).
Different deployment platforms may require specific setup instructions.
Always follow security best practices when deploying APIs to production.
